cardText1: Hi, and thanks for stopping by! I'm a software developer based in Galicia, North-West Spain, with a soft-spot for simple, elegant and human-centered design. I use a range of tools across the stack â€” feel free to check them out below.
cardText2: Before diving into code, I worked in product management and UX research across publishing and education, so accessibility is at the heart of everything I build.
